definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: count, number, reckon, assign (NH id.; As. manû Dl:HWB 416; Ar. many assign, apportion; Aram. mno0, [[מְנָא]]);—

count, number (cf. [[סָפַר]]) dust (grains) Ge 13:16 (J), cf. [[עֲפַר יַעֲקׂב]] Nu 23:10 (JE); money 2Ki 12:11; stars ([[מִסְפָּר לַכּוֹכָבִים]] ´[[מ]]) Ps 147:4; flock Je 33:13 (symb. of peace); days Ps 90:12; people, army 2Sa 24:1, 1Ch 21:1, 1Ch 21:17, cf. 1Ch 27:24 (object om.); 1Ki 20:25.
reckon, assign, appoint  [[לַחֶרֶב]] Is 65:12 (with play on [[מְנִי]] v:Is 65:11).
be counted, numbered, of descendants Ge 13:16 (J), of people 1Ki 3:8 (‖[[נִסְפַּר]]); of sacrificial animals 1Ki 8:5 = 2Ch 5:6 (both ‖ id.); indef. Ec 1:15.
be reckoned, assigned (a place), of servant of ´[[י]] Is 53:12 (c. [[אֶת פּשְׁעִים]]).

definitions.title: Pi.
definitions.body: (late and poet.) (B Aram. and Targum. [[מַנִּי]]);—Pf. [[מִנׇּה]] Da 1:10, Da 1:11; [[מִנּוּ]] Job 7:3; Impf. [[וַיְמַן]] Jon 2:1 + 4 t.; Imv. [[מַן]] Ps 61:8; appoint, ordain, food Da 1:10, v:Da 1:5 (sq. [[לְ]]), officer v:Da 1:11 (sq. [[על]]); nights of weariness ([[לֵילוֹת עָמָל]]) Job 7:3 (subj. indef.; sq. [[לְ]]); in story of Jonah, object. fish Jon 2:1, ricinus Jon 4:6, worm v:Jon 4:7, wind v:Jon 4:8 (all subj. ´[[י]]); obj. [[חֶסֶד וֶאֱמֶת]] Ps 61:8 (subj. ´[[י]]).
